name: Mayonnaise Hole
storyline: Two friends try to spread awareness of their new sport. Their latest publicity stunt sends them on an unexpected adventure!
summary:
Get the mayonnaise in the hole!

With reactive string physics, 1:1 hand tracking, and a dynamic original soundtrack from Mustin (The OneUps) featuring guest tracks from Robbie Benson (Super Soul Bros.), experience the thrill and satisfaction of sinking a mayonnaise hole without tying a single knot. As you play, you'll travel to unique environments that pose added challenges. A moving hole, vertigo, wind, and many more surprises only possible in VR. Just how far does this mayonnaise hole go?
